lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The dollar should worth more than 170 yen based on purchasing power parity, the Ministry of International Trade and Industry (MITI) said in its annual white paper on international trade.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analyzing the expansion in Japan's trade imbalance in recent years, MITI calculated that 37 pct of it could be accounted for by exchange rates, 24 pct by differences in economic growth rates between Japan and other countries, and 36 pct by so-called price elasticities of imports and exports.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S.) exports have picked up somewhat with the dollar's fall in value, no marked improvements have appeared in the import picture," MITI said.
